Paragraph: In ethacrynic acid - induced convulsions , these neurotransmitter systems may be differentially modulated , probably through activation of glutaminergic neurons in the brain .

| Ethacrynic acid - induced convulsions |

In this paragraph, the disease entity is "Ethacrynic acid - induced convulsions". The paragraph is discussing the possible effects of Ethacrynic acid on the brain and neurotransmitter systems, specifically mentioning convulsions as a potential outcome. Therefore, the disease entity is the condition or symptom described in the paragraph.
